name: RoomSaathi
desc: A MERN stack based web platform for discovering verified PGs, hostels, and apartments with smart search and booking features.

name: DineQr
desc: A QR-based digital menu platform that allows restaurants to showcase menus, manage orders, and enhance contactless dining experience.

name: Inventory Management System
desc: A web-based system for managing products, stock levels, and sales with real-time tracking features.

name: Pragati.AI
desc: The web application is built using MERN stack and GO provides a user-friendly interface for handling Docker containers.

name: NLP to SQL using LLM
desc: It uses the GPT-3 model provided by OpenAI to generate SQL commands and responses based on user inputs. The assistant can receive voice commands and text inputs, providing SQL commands as output.

name: Location Based Emergency
desc: The Mobile app which locates yourself providing every possible emergency services in your area,please view the linkedin post.

name: ChatBot
desc: Building a Simple Chatbot from Scratch in Python (using NLTK)

name: 3-tier-Kubernetes
desc: A complete 3-tier kubernetes setup includes frontend,backend and database.

name: Basic full stack website
desc: The basic Event website to be hosted on AWS EC2 instance.

name: AWS EC2 Instance Management using Hand Gestures
desc: It uses the OpenCV library for capturing webcam video and the HandTrackingModule from the cvzone library to detect hand gestures. The code allows launching and terminating EC2 instances based on detected gestures.

name: Distance of Face from Camera
desc: It demonstrates face detection and calculating the distance of a detected face from the camera.

name: Video sharing Application
desc: This script implements a simple video call application using OpenCV and Tkinter. It provides the ability to either send live video from your webcam to a specified directory on a web server or receive and display video from a specified IP address.

name: Amazon Product Scraping
desc: It utilizes the requests library for making HTTP requests and the BeautifulSoup library for parsing HTML content.

name: HTTPD Dockerfile
desc: This Dockerfile sets up an Apache HTTP Server on CentOS 7.
